content.detailedDescription:
this is a lot of reading so i do apologies.  i���ve had sightings and a possible abduction since i was a kid and as recent as last fall.  i am not going to put all, just the ones that i deem the strangest.  please also excuse any grammar mistakes.  my father is english major, growing up he always crammed it down my throat. i guess as a form of rebellion, i made it a point not to do great in english.  needless to say, i feel like the dummy now.  

      when i was about 10 years old my family and i were just walking through the door on 4th of july.  the whole house lit up green and you could clearly tell something went over it.  my father being the way he was then wrote it off as fireworks but, i remember my mother running to the porch and looking everywhere thinking a plane had crashed or something.  after a few minutes of gazing into the woods, she then came in a searched the news for information.  the really odd thing about it though was, the next day not my father, my brother, or my mother had any recollection of it.  

      when i was seventeen my cousin (justin,) two friends (zach and brandon) and i made a day trip from lake eire to canada.  it was about ten or eleven a clock at night when we crossed the border back into the united states.  now, i want to say the drive is about three and a half hours but, i could be wrong give or take a few.  justin was driving i was sitting behind him.  zach was the passenger and brandon to my right.  when i woke i could see a boat swaying back and forth but could not move or talk just stare.  it then accorded to me a boat can���t be on the road.  i realized it was being pulled by a truck and was finally able to move my eyes.  everyone in the car was just stiff and staring straight ahead with emotionless faces.  somehow justin was still driving.  after about a minute and a half i was able to speak.  ���what happened?���  justin was the next to come out of the ���trance.���  ���i do not remember driving.���  he said in a weird sort of disbelief.  after that all of us came out of it and there we saw the exit for erie.  to all of us though, it was as if we had just crossed the border ten minutes ago.  justin was always the logical type.  he did not believe in anything paranormal.  i remember being kids going to places that were said to be haunted and he was the type to run ahead and hide in the woods to scare you.  he always had an explanation for everything.  however years later just a few months before his death i asked him if he remember this.  instantly i saw him get goosebumps and he said to me.  ���sean, i can explain everything in my life.  that i cannot and it still scares me a bit to this day.���  

      roughly a year after the erie incident about four of my friends and i took a walk on the montour trail in cecil township pennsylvania.  we did this often at night.  the walk was about a mile and half long.  our ending point was this huge old train bridge that sits about two hundred feet above the water.  on our way back not one of us said a word over half the way.  there was this mesmerizing light right in the center of the sky that i can only best describe as a lantern.  it was so bright and we were all entranced by.  it was almost as if when one of use finally said something about it, the object started to move to our right.  one of my friends and i then ran up a steep hill to see where it was going.  once we got to the top, we saw the ���lantern��� about half mile out over farm land spin and drop.  we then observed another similar looking object coming in from the right.  shaken, we ran down this hill to the rest of the group and quickly got to the car.  zach, whom was with us in erie, lived right up the road from this on a good bit of land.  he once told me of something possibly landing in one of his field and scaring his dogs.  however i cannot speak for him.

      last september or october i was sitting outside my parents��� house on the outskirts of canonsburg pennsylvania.  my mother who before this day did not believe in anything of this sort was sitting on the porch.  i was in the yard playing guitar when i notice a blinking light in the distant sky.  it was mostly blinking purple by would from time to time go clear.  i had my mom come look and i could tell she was a little confused by it.  after five minutes of sitting still, smaller lights started to come from all directions towards it, and then it was just gone.  about a week after this my grandmother, mom, and i sat on the porch talking.  my mom brought up those lights.  not long after something huge flew over the yard beside the house.  i ran over but there was nothing.  you could not hear it coming or going, just when it was on top of you.  i was still on the side of the house and another one flew right over top of me.  once again, no sound was coming or going, just when it was above you.  when i looked up it was massive, about the size of the house i would say.  i don���t know if it was because it was so big but, it looked like it was only two hundred feet in the air.  i remember thinking it was going to scrape the tree tops.  it was a v.  just like the letter looks.  i could see the dark sky in-between it.  it was really black but it seemed to me to be reflective like something metallic.  as quick as this all started it was over.  my grandmother was really shaken and i remember her describing it as ���it sounded like the world was coming to an end.���  

      i have seen and experienced some other strange things, but these are the ones that stick out most in my mind.  keep doing what you do.  the world needs more people in it that research this sort of thing.

with best regards 
sean
content.summary: More then one in this.  maybe an abduction coming from canada

content.detailedDescription: I had a hd camera attached to a small rc quadcopter waiting to launch. the images were noticed in processing of the video.
content.summary: Filmed at 1440 res from distance duration 1 sec or less

content.detailedDescription: I thought it might be a star but it definitely was not i shot it to the northeast of my location it was very bright lots of colors and they were blinking on and off then they would stay on for a few minutes. i was watching tv at the time and the ufo caught my attention .I watched it for approximately 45 minutes with field glasses. it all of a sudden disappeared while i was watching it it was completely stationary. that is all..
content.summary: I thought it might be a star but it definitely was not i saw it to the northeast very bright then it disappeared all at once.

content.detailedDescription: Went to put dogs out for the night around 9:30 pm. as i looked up at night sky, i see what i thought at first was an aircraft. at first i thought it was on fire or one of it's engines was on fire as it slowly flew along at around 1000 -1500 feet. it was orange-yellow in color. i tried to determine if it was a fixed-wing or rotary a/c, but it was neither. it made no sound. i'm former u.S. air force and in the aerospace business, so i know aircraft. it slowly headed west, then north, then slowly upward into the sky. i called my wife to come out to see it. i quickly ran inside and grabbed by iphone to film it. the video is not very good but i did capture its movement for around 20-seconds. the event lasted around 10-minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: At first i thought it was an aircraft on fire moving slowly about a half mile from my vanage point. no sound, controlled movement. brightness made it difficult to make out shape.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my home to smoke a cigarrette. the hillsides are beginning to green out, and as i was absent mindedly scanning them, a seemingly out of place object in the sky above the mountain cauggt my attention. it was a bright oblong object flying silently towards the northeast. my initial thought was that the glow may have came from the rising sun, however, a jet was not far behind, seeming as if it were approaching the object at an angle, and it was not glowing at anytime. the glow was steady and unchanging, shiny and gold-like. the object left no contrail and was moving at a higher rate of speed than the jet. at least 2 other jets have went in the same direction in the following ten minutes, none of which appeared to have the same glow, all leaving contrails. as the object passed by, despite being silent, the neighborhood dogs began barking, and did so for a couple of minutes afterwards. i started to come inside and retrieve my phone in hopes to capture a video but it was moving too fast. i knew by the time i would have made it back outside, it would be gone. i watched the object until it flew out of sight beyond the tree line. perhaps it was nothing unusual at all, but i felt compelled to report it. i did feel slightly uneasy and anxious during the viewing.
content.summary: Glowing object moving silently followed by jet.

content.detailedDescription: Walking into target on millerville.. look up and there are two orb shaped fireballs following eachother in a straight line and then soon after third one appeared. me and friend laughed and took short videos and thought of it as a joke but the more we thought about it the more strange it was.
content.summary: First two orb fireball like balls were following each other and then a third came

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the store i looked up and seen a orange orb it had what lookes like a white see through light comeing from it i lookes away and it was gone thought tjat was weird and it just showed back up in a diffrent spot in the sky it was a solid light and orb shaped it was kindof cool to see such a thing
content.summary: Orange light with white beam

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were out back sitting in our hot tub, we were in the tub for 10 minutes or so relaxing and my wife sees a red shooting star over the eastern horizon.  i did not see it, but i am a big astronomy buff and we were discussing that we were happy we can see the stars more clearly and couldnt wait for a meteor shower so that we could watch from our backyard, which is pretty void of too much light pollution.  

as we were talking, my wife and i saw a satellite very faintly in the eastern portion of almost directly above us and we talked again about how it was nice to not have too much light out by us.  at that point, she was trying to look to see where the moon was and commented how clear it was (there was a slight haze to the northeast, not anything significant), to which i said, the moon is over behind the top of the house and was sort of out of view.  

i was facing north-northwest, she was facing southeast.  

i turned because i was trying to notice if i saw any shooting stars or anything, and that was when i turned to the west and saw a somewhat dim, yet clearly visible unbalanced diamond shaped object, clearly larger than an airplane (we live about 12 miles or so south of cleveland airport and nasa lewis research center, but rarely have planes come over our way as they are typically routed out of the northeast, or takeoff going southwest).  i was somewhat speechless at first because i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  it honestly looked like something out of a science fiction movie that hollywood would come up with.  

the shape was almost kite like, but had a mirror-like appearance and had 4 rings almost like a donut shape at each of the tips of the object.  the rings were sort of flickering like when a fluorescent light is just turning on or about to burn out.  it wasnt a pulsing, it was more of a shimmering sort of flickering.  the thing that seemed odd was that the object appeared to be the same color as the sky behind it.  i have grown up near the airport and have seen planes overhead for 35 years and have never seen anything like it.  as it started to dawn on me what i was seeing i yelled for my wife to look but at this point, it was getting farther away to where she could not see it.  i could still see it, but it was faint to begin with but i was still tracking where it was in the sky so i knew where it was.  

while telling her to look for it i turned off the jets on the tub to see if i could hear anything but it was completely silent.  i did notice that the object was not heading towards the airport, but rather, just west of it, as if it didnt even care that the airport was there. 

i stood in the hottub not understanding what it was i just saw for about 10 minutes while my wife was asking me about what it was i saw.  i was speechless.  i have never seen anything like it before in my life.  i drew the basic shape with the rings and such on the fridge to try to explain it to her.  

i feel like i am your every day john q. public.  i have no reason to embellish or make this up.  i always have an eye on the sky, mainly because of my childhood love of astronomy.  i would love to explain it as a military type craft or something, but it just didnt feel like it was something that i had heard about or seen on tv somewhere.  

i have no good explanation, and hence, i am here, hoping that someone else in the northern ohio area saw something.
content.summary: Silent diamond transparent four rings at tips

content.detailedDescription:
Had just left the store. was preparing to to turn onto speedway from camino seco when i saw a blue fluorescent light flickering above the treeline to the northeast of me.As i turned onto speedway, it started moving. then lit up deep blue. as it flew over me, the bottom was rotating counter clockwise and it had 4 orange lights on the bottom that were also rotating.  as it passed me, i looked back and it took off due east. it was gone in 2 seconds. as i turned onto my street, a few blocks down the road, i saw a helicopter heading west in the same place the object had gone. it flew by my house, headed west for some time, turned northeast and then disappeared.

i waited and watched to see if anything else would happen, but that was the end of it. i wanted to pull over to snap a picture but it disappeared before i could even attempt to pull over.
content.summary: Blue fluorescent light hovered, then moved east right over car. then took off. gone in 2 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the drug store my mother was in the passenger seat when 2 blocks from home my mother said "whats that" .. im not military but planes are a bobby of mine and ive never seen a plane this big or that can move this fast.. it stays with my car at around treetop level till a get in front of my house then it accelerates southward i attempted to follow but couldnt catch it.. my neighbor across the street finds me a few mins later and tells me he saw the same thing minutes before i did on the opposite side of town.. the next night april 11th i take my dog outside and its sitting over my house i pull my phone up to take a picture and its gone.. i know im not crazy
content.summary: Driving home and it followed over my car then accelerated suddenly

content.detailedDescription: Looking out of my living room window up the bristol channel towards the second adverb crossing. i saw an object bright white like the space station as it passed over to just above the horizon in about 60 secs it got smaller with distance but did not fade out . it reached just above horizon then it turned gracefully right as it drifted away, like a curved trajectory while keeping a low altitude just above the town lights of what must be almondsbury or further north. it was not a plane. too bright, no sound and not landing lights as i saw mostly from the rear of it's path. no strobing navigation lights. just like a bright white star. only posting here due to the fact it changed course so can not be a satalite either. my girlfriend witnessed the latter part of the observation and direction change. clear skies no other traffic in the sky.No clouds i could make out . some clouds on horizon. completely silent event.
content.summary: Looking out up the severn estuary from portishead then light just like the space station flew overhead in a ne direction i watched expecting it to fade out . it reached just above horizon in about 60 seconds then it turned right as it drifted away.

content.detailedDescription: Driving by the corner of carlton and germantown rd i spotted a drone like figure descend nw of me. as i exited my truck i saw it land and take off heading south flying over 300 ft power lines.
content.summary: Read the detailed description

content.detailedDescription: I am guessing i was around 10 years old when this happened. my cousins and i decided to get the snowmobile out and ride between their property and ours which was next door to each other. there was 3 of us on 1 snowmobile i was driving and we would follow the property line on the north side of our property driving west. and then make a big loop and head back towards our house then go south to their house. and turn around  and back and forth we would ride. on one of these trips as we were doing a turn in the field we saw a craft above the tree line. i remember saying something to my cousins and  putting the snowmobile full throttle and being really scared. from that moment  there is a blank until we were walking in my cousins house 2 or 3 hours later looking at the clock and it was eleven pm.  i'm figuring we ate dinner at 6:00 because our parents went out to go to a christmas party. so from 7:00 -7:30 pm is when we started riding. this is just one of the abductions and sightings i have had over the years. would really like to be hypnotized so i would know the truth,i have so much missing time.
content.summary: Snowmobile riding with cousins  when we saw craft above trees.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was a block away from where i needed to park to visit a friend of mine.
2. i was slowing down to go over a speed bump, as i approached the speed bump i noticed an object streak in the sky. i brought my vehicle to a dead stop.
3. at first i thought i saw a shooting star, but this was too close and too big and the bright trail it left behind was almost hypnotizing, a blue and white streak that trailed the object which looked like a round pokemon ball with blue on top and white on the bottom and it immediately had me thinking ufo.
4. it streaked across the sky, came to a dead stop mid flight. what seamed to be lower than our planes coming in but 200+ feet higher than telephone poles, this also isn't too far away from incoming planes landing at san diego international airport, but there were no planes in sight, it paused there for what seamed like forever but most likely only for 20 seconds. the trail it left behind reminded me of a comet's tail but when the object stopped, the trail stayed right behind it and stopped also. after 20 seconds or so, i saw it dart north at supersonic speed and was gone in a flash.
5. my feeling was immediate disbelief but also instantly i thought ufo. i've always wanted to see a ufo, my father had me watching scifi shows since i was little and have always been fascinated with them. i finally got to see one! excitement!
6. as i mentioned above, after it paused there, all of a sudden, whoosh it was gone. heading north and up towards the stars at what i can guess would be a 45 degree angle from its hover position.
content.summary: Blue/white pokemon ball looking shooting star came to dead stop!

content.detailedDescription:
On 4/10/14, at approximately 10 am; i set up my video camera facing at a 90 degree angle directly up into the sky. when reviewing video at 1/8 speed, i noticed a "cylindrical" shaped object move from the bottom of the screen(from the west), and going to the top right(towards the north)...Then following behind it by approximately 5 seconds a second object; which was dark, and shaped much like the object under the baltic sea(seriously), was slightly to the right(north) of cylinder, and actually did a "death roll" while in flight, but veered a little further right(north) of cylindrical object.  

several minutes later, i picked up 2 additional objects that appeared to be much higher in the sky(as they were smaller in appearance, and slightly fuzzy;i believe, do to high-level cyrus type clouds). these appeared from the west(left side of screen); with one moving towards top of screen(east), and the other coming in the screen slightly to the right(north), of first object; moving at a 45 degree angle to the right(north)and center screen.  i believe this object was either larger or lower in elevation; as it is more visible.

the only object that can be seen at full speed was the darker object(but very quick).  i've attached 2 clips for you; one at full speed, then the other is slowed to 1/8 of full speed; and this is where you'll notice the cylinder object coming from bottom right(still very quickly), then the darker craft(also from the bottom right)...Then towards the end of clip, you can see the 2 other crafts mentioned come in from the bottom left of screen(they are lighter(i believe due to elevation), and very fast as well.

i had filled out another report in march; of which was published with the still shot; and sent a report in regarding the capture i received on 4/6/14; but hadn't seen it, or heard back.  this is a truly amazing catch; because i speculate that the darker craft "might" be one of ours possibly chasing the cylindrical craft; but the "death roll" is very obvious too!

i've attached the full-speed and 1/8th speed clips; along with stills that show each different crafts caught on video.

thank you for your hard efforts!!!
content.summary: Set my video camera 90 degrees up into the sky, and found 4 different anomalies; with the first being cylindrical, second being a saucer with a notch out of front center; then 2 saucers(?)

content.detailedDescription:
Began out of north sky 10:00 position from where i stood, facing n ne  as a dim flicker glittering light. the effect of glittering may have been the effect of its altitude and/or distance . at first i thought a reflection of a distant search light against the very clear night sky. at first very small the size less than that of a marble bigger than a bee bee. it did not deviate in its path or direction. after first ten seconds of sighting it took shape as a  boomerang. by the time it was directly overhead, approximately 15 to 20 seconds after first sighting, its size was less than an inch, able to cover with thumb with extended arm. i estimate the speed as 2 x's faster then that of low flying piper cub. unable to give an estimate of altitude. as it entered the dim glow of the city lights of salt lake city, being a very clear night approximately 35 to 45 seconds into observation, it vanished absorbed by dim city lights.  the number of lights on the boomerang were approximately two hundred evenly spaced, clearly visible. although it was clearly a boomerang shape. any clear outline could not be made out because of the position of the lights, a fussy and ghostly effect. i remained outside for a several minutes excited about what i had just witnessed listening for any noise or sounds. not a whisper. depending on the altitude of this object it could have been very huge and very fast. it was all over in less than a minute. this compared to a commercial airliner that can be observed for several minutes at high altitude.
     my question is was their other observations of this type on this date july 29th 2013 at about 10:00 pm ?    


    thank you for your time all you do.


                                            [name removed/cms/tg]





ps this was not my first sighting.
content.summary: Boomerang simple streat flight from n nw to e se 140 degrees.

content.detailedDescription: This video was recorded in fontana california. i was showing off my new dji phantom fc40 remote controlled quadcopter with a camera on it to some coworkers. i never saw anything in the sky i just had camera on so we could see video through phone screen.  i imported the video into computer and didn't watch for several days later and noticed orbs on video. not sure what it is but looks like a couple of ufos
content.summary: See description below

content.detailedDescription:
It was 8:56 pm and had just become completely dark outside. i was driving home from my daughters house and heading south on 7th street. i had already observed 2 instances of lights disappearing and doing odd things earlier that night, so when i saw this light ahead, i thought "you've got to be kidding me."
there's a very small mountain range directly south of my position, maybe 2 miles away. there was a bright light just above the mountains that appeared to be stationary. it was white with a blue undertone; very bright and constant, with no pulsing or blinking. it looked just like a street light, only centered over the road. when i came to a stop sign, the light was elevating very slowly; or so i thought. it was just moving towards me and gave the illusion it was rising. upon approach, it became obvious that there were in fact two lights of the same color; side by side. i would guess they were two lights on one vehicle. i came to the main st. stop sign and watched. the lights passed directly over my car. watching through the t-tops of my trans am, i then opened my door and stuck my head out. it was extremely quiet with only a wispy / static / electrical type hissing sound. it was subtle, and almost inaudible. it was then, that i could see a ring; a halo right dead center of the two lights. i was looking at the under-belly of this object. the ring was barely noticeable and not illuminated. it just looked grey in comparison to the night sky, and the bright white/blue lights flanking the ring. it passed over very slowly and deliberately. i got the sense this was close to the ground; closer than an airplane on approach anyway. i could see no outline of a craft, which makes me think the object was black.
a honk from the car behind me, had me shutting my door and driving on. it was about 3 minutes from the time i spotted the object until it flew directly over me and i drove away. like i said, it seemed to be an active night as i'd seen other lights in the sky doing "other than normal" things.
content.summary: Saw it approach straight on, it flew directly over my car.

content.detailedDescription:
Ce jour l����, le 16/09/2012 un apr����s-midi tr����s ensoleill���� avec un ciel sans nuage,je me promenais en raz de campagne muni de mon appareil photo (canon eos 40d ����quip���� d'un zoom 70-300 mm)���� la recherche d'animaux sauvages ���� photographier (li����vre, chevreuil, sanglier).
je longeais un champ de ma����s, quand j'ai entendu le bruit caract����ristique du moteur d'une aile volante, ce qui me fit lever la t����te pour la trouver et la photographier;je n'ai pas trouv���� l'aile volante.
quand soudain j'ai aper����u droit devant moi, se d����tachant dans le ciel bleu et au-dessus d'une for����t, une petite boule blanche (que j'ai pris une premi����re fois en photo, et photo que je n'ai h����las pas gard���� au cours du transfert sur mon ordi, trouvant cela trop petit !!!)
cette boule se d����pla����ait dans le ciel en ligne droite et arrivait sur ma position, je n'arrivais pas ���� en d����finir la texture, cela apparaissait comme dissimul���� au-dessus d'une masse vaporeuse blanche, genre nuage ! 
j'ai eu le temps de faire 2 autres photos(pratiquement identiques)quand l'objet se trouvait presque ���� ma hauteur (angle de 70����)
j'ai aussit����t regard���� le r����sultat agrandi sur l'����cran de mon appareil photo (l���� j'ai vu qu'il y avait comme des formes arrondies en p����riph����rie de cette boule blanche)
j'ai donc essay���� de faire une autre photo, mais h����las l'objet allant sortir de mon champ de vision, je n'ai pu prendre qu'une troisi����me photo "���� la vol����e" et l'objet est compl����tement flou.
content.summary: Une boule blanche venant dans ma direction

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday i filed a mufon report 55342 of a ufo sighting @ 3;30am.

today i woke up @ 4am, went on my deck to look at the stars...There was nothing as bright in the sky as the object i observed on 25 hours previously

after perusing the skies, i noticed a light in the woods behind my home approximately 500-600 feet from my home.  it was starlike.  there is 23 acres of woods behind my home with homes 1/2 a mile to 1 mile a way.

i noticed what looked like a star in at the mid-way point of the tree line  (30 feet in the air).  it remained stationary.  i stared at it hoping it was a home light.  i have never noticed this light in my 12 years of living at my home.

at times it appeared to move up and down...Anywhere from 1-3 inches (from my vantage point).   i know stars can give this illusion if i look long enough...But the light dimmed, as though moving away, then became brighter as if moving towards my direction...At the 14 minute point of observing this orb, it moved in a small circular motion mid-speed (not slowly, but not fast)for two rotations, and that is when i went back in my home.

it was at this point i felt uncomfortable.  i have heard enough stories of people observing a ufo, and then orbs...

while i am grateful to have witnessed such things in the last 25 hours, i am in no way interested in writing an abduction story.
content.summary: On 4/10/14 @3:30am, i witnessed a ufo.  today, 4/11/14 @ 4:05, i witnessed an orb in the woods behind my home.

content.detailedDescription: I was just outside about to bring my dog in and after whistling to get her to come to me i looked up and to my left above my neighbors house i saw this really bright light, and before i knew it it disappeared. i don't know if i actually saw anything it was 2 in the morning and i was tired also i had been watching hangar 1 on tv. i just thought i'd do this in case someone else saw it and needed support.
content.summary: It was like a shooting star, but it was very bright and moved fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of my family on the beach at south padre isalnd, tx. when i got home to view the photos, i noticed some white objects in the just above the water near the clouds. i took several pictures of the sand and ocean along with the clouds. i thought it might be some type of balloon but i didn't see any balloons in the area. as i zoomed in closer on my screen, i noticed three of the same objects flying in some type of formation. my pictures i submitted will show how they were traveling in a northward bound along the gulf of mexico. i would think that the dea or coast guard might be flying drones along the water for drug trafficking operations. i really don't think they would fly three drones at once and in that type of formation. please take a look at the photos and evaluate them as needed. they were taken with in 1 min and 4 sec. time frame....   thanks..

spiufo1 3:05:00 pm
spiufo2 3:05:00 pm
spiufo3 3:05:09 pm
spiufo4 3:05:28 pm
spiufo5 3:05:42 pm
spiufo6 3:05:51 pm
spiufo7 3:06:04 pm
content.summary: Objects were seen in my photos. did not see with the naked eye at the time.

content.detailedDescription: While driving east home with family, 4 kids and husband, i noticed the giant moon in front of us and directed the kids to see such an awesome site. suddenly just below the moon i noticed 2 triangles of white lite, like two arrows, one set in front of the other heading directly south. the second set slowly dimmed, then showed up bright in front of the other set...This pattern kept repeating itself..As it continued moving south.  the rear set would slowly dim and then appear in front of the other set. this continued on until i lost it over the horizon due to trees. it was not moving at at fast pace and did not have aircraft positioning lights.  we travelled approx a mile to our home and it stayed in site for another minute till trees blocked our view.  a little background information: i am an af brat and was in the aviation navy for 10 years.  i have been around aircraft, rockets, blimps, and helos all my life.   living near eglin and being overseas..I have also seen chaff. what it reminded me of if it had been moving east would be 2 jet engine aircraft in after burners..Then turning off burners and exchanging sides .Over and over again. once we reached home and turned off car and kids ran into house....There was no jet or prop sounds heard.  i did call eglin and started to report what i had seen....Got embarrassed and hung up.  asked around and later searched the web and haven't found anyone else with similar experience.   have y'all?
content.summary: 2 sets of triangle white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting my car in alamo with head resting on the door (window down) staring at the stars.And then here's this big round soft glowing object intermixing in the stars as big as a quarter. i quickly get out and stare up at it and it's up there and the light turns off! so now it's a black circle flying passing through the stars.So it continues this pulsating for the next coupl minutes. but as it get further from me it becoming mor of a cigar  shape. and that when two more appeared . now three are pulsating and the third to appear shot to the east like a bullet it was there and it was gone with a streak! a million pearl could of saw this u couldn't miss it it was the moon flying.
content.summary: It was the moon flying, greatest thing ever saw

content.detailedDescription:
For as long as i can remember (mind you i was born in 1974) it has always intrigued me because i have heard stories from family members on their sightings of ufo's and trust and believe they don't talk let alone call anything in out in kewaunee county wi. 
my grandmother was fearful at night after witnessing a ufo hovering over the back field. i remember that she made my stepfather walk out there to see if he seen anything, the look she had on her face was chilling. there was nothing there no depression in the snow. she talked about it being round with different bright lights pulsing. 
my uncle was a county sheriff deputy and while on duty found a ufo hovering over a church with three bright white lights
my experience was getting off work in sturgeon bay wi around 9 pm. i always took cty u home because it was a nice peaceful drive no traffic. out of the corner of my left eye i slowed down and ended up coming to a stop it hovered in front of me for 2 seconds about 350 feet above me.It was triangular in shape with a very slanted tip with broad back-end, it was silvery gray b;ack with blacker octagon rises near the front. it took off over the lake diving like it was going in the lake and then flies over the lake at warp speed and disappeared. i don't know how long i sat there in a state of shock and sped home!
content.summary: Driving home came out the tree line hovered 2secomds and shot off over lake mighigan

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what we saw i have experience from the military with aircraft what i saw had no anticollision lights and mad no sound went out to sea and the wind was blowing in land not out to sea.. i recorded both objects with my phone a 21 mpeg camera. first object was 813 pm second was shortly after like 815
content.summary: Walking dogs with my daughter and saw a light fly over it made no sound video taken then it went out to sea and then a second

content.detailedDescription:
I had been sitting on the balcony of the local pub, looking up at the sky, and actually wondering about ufo's with 2 friends, when i noticed a bright star-like object descend from the moon (which was about 80-90 degrees high in the sky above the horizon).
this object continued to descend about 2*moon diameters in altitude towards the horizon, and then remained stationary. it was a clear summer night.
my two friends had noticed this as well (and remained unimpressed, as they are skeptics).
as we were discussing what we saw, another bright star-like object was emitted or ejected from the first one and moved along the azimuth in an arc of about +45 degrees,  remaining at the same altitude.
for about 30 minutes both objects remained in the sky, somewhat brighter than background stars (but not as bright as the planets or sirius etc.).
another friend turned up, and as i was describing what we had seen and pointing to the objects, the second object accelerated and desceneded towards the horizon, much like a shooting star (i.E. nearly instantaneously), disappearing from view
this fourth witness was slightly more amazed at what they had seen. 
the first object still remained, but eventually there was little else to watch, and i stopped watching, forgetting about the object in the sky ( i cannot confirm if it persisted, moved or disappeared at a later time).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object appeared to launch from the moon, descended, split into two, remained stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking pictures of the sun with my cell phone from 5:00 pm till 5:15 pm and my husband came outside & suggested taking some of the moon, so i did. i took four pictures. i took one zoomed in first so i could capture detail of the moon, then zoomed out on my second one. i sat down in my chair outside and looked at the two pictures. i noticed a black object to the left of the moon in the picture that was not zoomed in. i thought: how interesting it was that it was in one picture and not the other. well, i got up from my chair and walked a few extra feet and took two more pictures. i did one zoomed in and one zoomed out. then i sat back down in my chair outside and looked at them. the one that was not zoomed in, had the black object in it but the other did not. this time, the shape was different. it now had what appeared to be a streak behind it like it was moving. my first thought was: hum! wonder what it is & why did it not show up in either of my close up pictures? well, my husband & i came inside and i plugged my cell phone to my computer and uploaded the pictures.
content.summary: Black object in eastern sky  west of the moon captured in two pictures.

content.detailedDescription: i have posted this before, but for some reason it didn't put the pictures or the video on here so i'm trying again. on april 9th, 2014 my daughter and i were going home from mcdonalds at around 9:00 pm. when we saw the object it was around 9:09 pm. we saw a bright light and thought it was just a plane, but we noticed it wasn't moving. so i handed my daughter my phone to take pictures and to record it. it was really big, it looked kind of metallic and kind of dull. it's very hard to explain since i was the one driving. i'm trying to upload from iphone 5c, i hope it works this time.
content.summary: Triangle or boomerang shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my door and looked up at the moon and saw the object moving from the south to the northeast.  it was a large bright light and it had a slight zig zag pattern; no sound, no emission.  it stopped and hovered and then continued northeast.  definitely wasn't a plane and i have been watching the skies for years, so i know what a satellite looks like and this was not a satellite.  right away it looked unusually large and bright.  the way it moved was too fast for any known aircraft at the altitude it was at.  it actually scared my son.  it faded when it went behind some mild clouds but then became bright again when it came out of the clouds.  it seemed to react to our excitement as at the peak of our amazement and conversation it stopped and almost looked like it got brighter, as if it was moving towards us.  when my young son started getting scared and began to cry a bit it started moving away from us again.  it continued northeast until we lost sight of it over the horizon.
content.summary: I walked out of my door and looked up at the moon and saw the object moving from the south to the northeast.  it was a large bright light and it had a slight zig zag pattern; no sound, no emission.  stopped and hovered and then continued northeast.
